    Short Bio

    I am currently a PhD student at Inria Lille-Nord Europe in team SequeL under the supervision of Emilie Kaufmann and Michal Valko. My research focuses on multi-armed bandits and its applications. Before I received a BSc and a MSc of Computer Science from Ecole normale supérieure de Cachan (Rennes Campus) and a BSc of Mathematics from Université Pierre et Marie Curie (Paris VI).

    Interests

    My main research interest lies in:

    • bandit theory
    • reinforcement learning
    • optimization
    • recommender system

    I'm also interested in:

    • deep learning
    • natural language processing
    • time series
    • optimal transport
